summary: The readers package supplies a collection of parsers that load various textual datasets—such as labeled sentences, natural language inference corpora, semantic similarity pairs, parallel files, and triplet structures—and convert each entry into a unified InputExample object for downstream sentence‑transformer training or evaluation.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly ingest and preprocess diverse text‑pair or triplet datasets into a standard format, accelerating the development and benchmarking of sentence embedding models.
